#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool cmp(int a,int b)
{
   if(a>b) return true;
   else return false;
}

int Factorial(int val) 
{ 
int Result = 1; 
for(int i = 1; i <= val; i++) 
{ 
Result *= i; 
} 
return Result;
} 
int ways(int N, int R) 
{ 
return (Factorial(N)) / ((Factorial(N-R)) * Factorial(R)); 
}

int main() {
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int k,total=0,count=0;
        int* array=new int[15];
          for(int i=0;i<11;i++)
          {
              cin>>array[i];
          }
          sort(array,array+11,cmp);
          cin>>k;
          int last=array[k-1];
           for(int i=0;i<11;i++)
          {
              if(array[i]==last)
              {
                  total++;
              }
          }
           for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
          {
              if(array[i]==last) count++;
          }
          int way=ways(total,count);
        //int way=ways(4,2);
        //cout<<total<<" "<<count<<endl;
          cout<<way<<endl;
          
          
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
